room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes" by Monroe Escape Rooms in Monroe (MI)
room_address: 14750 Laplaisance Road, Suite H30 Monroe, MI 48161
room_description:
Sherlock was helping his brother, Mycroft, to unravel a plot against the Prime Minister. With the evil guys closing in, the detective was forced to hide the documents exposing the criminals in his 221B apartment.
Your job is to visit Sherlock's apartment and find the secret documents he has left for his brother before the attack on the Prime Minister is launched.
